title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 97.20 - Judicial appeal from the final administrative determination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 97.20 - Judicial appeal from the final administrative determination

State Regulations

Within 120 days after the final determination, a party may appeal from the final
determination by commencing a proceeding for judicial review under article 78 of the New York State Civil Practice Law and Rules. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
97.20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
